subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Donald Young, a qualifier, beat fifth-ranked Andy Murray in straight sets in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells. Calif., on Saturday.
snippet: Donald Young, a qualifier, beat fifth-ranked Andy Murray in straight sets in the second round of the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells. Calif., on Saturday.
